dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a popular e-commerce app where the recommendation results are displayed as 2 Ã— 3 grid-based panels. The dataset contains 20,000 user requests for training and 1,000 for testing, with user feedback collected as labels.

dcterms:description: A simulated environment dataset used for experiments to test whether Panel-MDP and other RL-based algorithms can capture user activity patterns.
dcterms:title: Simulated environment dataset
